Headline: #66 Chicago Temporary Reroute at Chicago/Laramie
ShortDescription: 66 Chicago buses are temporarily rerouted via Chicago, Central, Agusta, Laramie, and Chicago due to, street blockage near Chicago/Laramie.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#66 Chicago buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Chicago, Central, Agusta, Laramie, and Chicago, due to street blockage near Chicago/Laramie.

Allow extra travel time.
